title: How to listen to Spotify without premium - Quora

response.answer_text: Apply for a Spotify free account to listen to ad-supported music on Spotify. If you want to listen to Spotify music without the ads, upgrade your account to premium or use a music downloader, such as TunePat Spotify Converter to get ad-free music with a free account.
Spotify offers a free version. You can listen to Spotify songs online for free without a Spotify Premium account.
